name: perl-plack

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Perl Superglue for Web frameworks and Web Servers (PSGI toolkit)

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-apache-logformat-compiler
dependencies.description: Compile a log format string to perl-code

dependencies.name: perl-devel-stacktrace
dependencies.description: An object representing a stack trace.

dependencies.name: perl-file-sharedir
dependencies.description: File::ShareDir - Locate per-dist and per-module shared files

dependencies.name: perl-filesys-notify-simple
dependencies.description: Simple and dumb file system watcher

dependencies.name: perl-test-requires
dependencies.description: Checks to see if the module can be loaded.

dependencies.name: perl-try-tiny
dependencies.description: Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@

dependent_to.name: perl-plack-test-externalserver
dependent_to.description: Run HTTP tests on external live servers

dependent_to.name: perl-plack-middleware-fixmissingbodyinredirect
dependent_to.description:
Plack::Middleware which sets body for redirect response, if it's not
already set

dependent_to.name: perl-plack-middleware-deflater
dependent_to.description: Compress response body with Gzip or Deflate

dependent_to.name: perl-plack-middleware-crossorigin
dependent_to.description: Adds headers to allow Cross-Origin Resource Sharing

dependent_to.name: perl-plack-middleware-methodoverride
dependent_to.description: Override REST methods to Plack apps via POST

dependent_to.name: perl-plack-middleware-assets
dependent_to.description: Concatenate and minify JavaScript and CSS files

dependent_to.name: perl-plack-middleware-reverseproxy
dependent_to.description: Supports app to run as a reverse proxy backend

dependent_to.name: perl-plack-middleware-removeredundantbody
dependent_to.description:
Plack::Middleware which removes body for HTTP response if it's not
required
